pageContext.claim: “I think I do very well with the African Americans. And I think I'm doing very well right now. And, frankly, if I didn't do very well, relatively speaking, as a Republican -- I mean, we should be way, way over 50 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Every poll shows Trump has extremely low approval ratings among blacks. Approval among black Americans has hovered around 10 percent over the course of Trump’s presidency, according to Gallup polling, with 8 percent approving in June. A Quinnipiac University poll found that 80 percent of registered African American voters think Trump is racist.
